charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(A) and 18:2 - CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: SENT: 151 mos. imprisonment. SUPERVISED RELEASE: 5 Yrs. BUY MONEY: $1,070. SA: $100.

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(B) and 18:2 - CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Count is DISMISSED on the Motion of the Government.

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(C) and 18:2 - CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE(3)

charges.charge_disposition: Count is DISMISSED on the Motion of the Government.

charges.charge_description: 18:9229g)(1) and 924(a)(2) - UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT OF FIREARMS, ETC.(4)
